attributes.action: Freeze petrol prices for the next 6 months
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Gordon Brown should freeze petrol prices for the next 12 months this would help the soaring cost of food prices,public transport,air travel,and help families with young children etc.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
